doc.field: Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records

The Stringer Files cover the period of 1949 to 1987 and contain a mix of biographical and personnel files for Time-Life News Service staff, correspondents, and bureau chiefs designated as stringers by the Time Inc. Archives at the time they received the records. Included in this subseries are stringer expense reports, cash advance forms, check requisition forms, intern project application forms, expense reports, receipts, invoices, press kits, writing samples, biographical data forms, photographs, negatives, lists of stringers, payment schedules, lists of bureau assignments, list of telex rental fees, dispatches, resumes, foreign travel worksheets, job applications, bureau finance reports, visa forms, and correspondence. The correspondence included in this series discusses advances, budgets, bookkeeping issues, payments, contact information, financial plans, salaries, intern selection, travel, health, bureau updates, telex charges, treatment of stringers, resignation, staffing changes, assignments, expenses, vacation, transfers, travel schedules, press accreditation, meetings, and retirements.
Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records
Series IV. Staff Files >> Subseries IV.C. Stringer Files
